description:
Daiya-chan`s in a tough spot?! Noticing something seems strange, Yuzuka and Mafuyu transform!! They combine their powers to go rescue her, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chosen Ones! It`s Time for You to Join Forces and Save the Captured Princess!
Erabareshimono yo! Imakoso Awasete Toraware no Princess o Sukuu no ja!
On va te sortir de là, Daiya !
選ばれし者よ! いまこそ力を合わせて囚われのプリンセスを救うのじゃ~!
